titleStmt.title: The double right of Scotish kings to England continued upward to the present reign. From Margaret grand daughter to Edmond Ironside married to Malcom the 3d. And from Margaret daughter to Henry the 7th married to James the 4th.

notesStmt.note: A fully-engraved genealogy of the English and Scottish royal lines to William and Mary.
Date of publication suggested by Wing.
Reproduction of the original in the National Library of Scotland.
